name: Buy Signal
detail: Indicates a potential upward movement in price based on technical indicators.

name: Sell Signal
detail: Indicates a potential downward movement in price based on technical analysis.

name: Overbought
detail: Suggests that the asset may be overvalued and a price decline could be coming.

name: Oversold
detail: Suggests that the asset may be undervalued and a price increase could be coming.

name: MACD Crossover
detail: A signal generated when the MACD line crosses above or below the signal line.
